Articles.Content:
Running 80% UI on an iMac at  2650 X 1440

I notice that the standard KSP mouse cursor seems to block the "mouse over" tool tips. For this example I direct your attention to the navball left side controls and the tooltips that display when you mouse over them. Placing the mouse over the Prograde control, I can read "ograde" rather than "Prograde", and when mousing over the Target control a read "rget" rather then "Target".

For a new player I would guess this could be quite frustrating.

Seems there needs to be a bit more thought about the placement of the mouse over info dialogues.

Thoughts?
